citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:30 A.M. on
31-Oct-17.
A telephone call was made at 10:30 AM to the contact number, and waited at the facility until 11:15 A.M.
Subsequent to the visit, the licensee called and said she had to go to work early today.

narrative:
